kathañca sāriputta vimutta cittaḥ hoti

original: Idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu ajjhattaṁ kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: idha sāriputta bhikkhu ajjhattam kāye kāya anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
analyzed: tassa kāye kāya anupassinaḥ viharataḥ cittam virajjati vimuccati an upādāya āsavehi
vedanāsu pe
citte

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
analyzed: tassa dhammesu dhamma anupassinaḥ viharataḥ cittam virajjati vimuccati an upādāya āsavehi

original: Evaṁ kho, sāriputta, bhikkhu vimuttacitto hoti.
analyzed: evam kho sāriputta bhikkhu vimutta cittaḥ hoti

original: Vimuttacittattā khvāhaṁ, sāriputta, mahāpurisoti vadāmi, avimuttacittattā no mahāpurisoti vadāmī”ti—
analyzed: vimutta citta ttā khvā āha sāriputta mahā purisaḥ iti vadāmi a vimutta citta ttā no mahā purisaḥ iti vadāmi iti
tam brūmi mahā purisaḥ iti

original: So idha sibbinimaccagāti sibbinī vuccati taṇhā.
analyzed: saḥ idha sibbini macca gāti sibbinī vuccati taṇhā

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ, yassesā sibbinī taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā.
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ sārāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla yassa isā sibbinī taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇa agginā daḍḍhā

original: So sibbiniṁ taṇhaṁ accagā upaccagā atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
analyzed: saḥ sibbinim taṇham accagā upaccagā atikkantaḥ samatikkantaḥ vītivattaḥ iti
sā u idha sibbini macca gā
tena āha bhagavān
saḥ ubhantam abhiññāya
majjhe mantā na lippati
tam brūmi mahā purisaḥ iti
saḥ idha

original: Saha gāthāpariyosānā ye te brāhmaṇena saddhiṁ ekacchandā ekapayogā ekādhippāyā ekavāsanavāsitā, tesaṁ anekapāṇasahassānaṁ virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
analyzed: saha gāthā pariyosānāḥ ye te brāhmaṇena saddhim eka chandāḥ eka payogāḥ eka adhippāyāḥ eka vāsana vāsitā tesam aneka pāṇa sahassānam virajam vīta malam dhamma cakkhum udapādi
yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tat nirodha dhamman ti

original: Tassa brāhmaṇassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucci.
analyzed: tassa brāhmaṇassa an upādāya āsavehi cittam

original: Saha arahattappattā ajinajaṭāvākacīratidaṇḍakamaṇḍalukesā ca massū ca antarahitā.
analyzed: saha arahatta pattā ajina jaṭāvāka cīra tidaṇḍa kamaṇḍalu kesā ca massū ca antarahitā

original: Bhaṇḍukāsāyavatthavasano saṅghāṭipattacīvaradharo anvatthapaṭipattiyā pañjaliko bhagavantaṁ namassamāno nisinno hoti—
analyzed: bhaṇḍu kāsāya vattha vasanaḥ saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dharaḥ anvattha paṭipattiyā pañjalikaḥ bhagavantam namassamānaḥ nisinnaḥ hoti
satthā me bhante bhagavā sāvakaḥ ham asmi iti
tissametteyya māṇava pucchā niddesaḥ dutiyaḥ
